post.author: stevenkim
post.content:
Sorry for writing in English...

Well, there is no response to your request yet, so I will try to express my
personal opinion about your inquiry.


1. Honestly, I can not tell which school is better or worse because
    there is no such a guideline like in Korea.

    However, Computer science in U, of Waterloo is well known here.  
    It does not necessarily mean that their Graduate course is also well
    recognized.

    Other possible schools are U. of Toronto, Western, etc.


2.  Unfortunately, the Job prospect is not well known to me yet.

    Generally, the present job market here (North America) is
    very depressed compare to last few years.

    Unless it is a sort of research job, average company values
    your work experience more than education background.
    
     Therefore having a master degree could be advantageous,
     but it may not always be in candidacy.  

     (They usually do not care much about which school
       you graduated from as long as you have a degree.
       This is a different aspect of culture here compare to Korea. )

  This is just my PERSONAL opinion, not necessarily correct
  and accurate.

  I hope you could collect more facts from other sources for you to make
  a good decision.

  Thank you very much.

  SK




>저는 서울에서 직장생활하다 그만둔 사람입니다.
>
>전자계산학과를 나왔는데
>
>공부에대해 미련을 못버려서 대학원을 캐나다로
>
>가보면 어떨까 생각중입니다.
>
>여기 성격하곤 별로 맞지 않겠지만...
>
>혹시 관심있으시면 답변부탁드리겠습니다...
>
>전산관련 대학원이 어디가 좋은지...
>
>졸업하고나서 취업은 현재 상황이 어떤지.. 뭐 등등...
post.title: [re] 캐나다 전산학과 대학원에 대해...
